name: Desolast
description:
You are thrown to unknown planet. You don't have a clue of the dangers and challenges waiting for you. Build a shelter. Explore the endless landscapes of the planet. Invent new machines and tools. It is the only way to survive.

Desolast is a falling-sand game that completely differs from other falling-sand games. It innovatively takes use of falling-sand engine to implement very exceptional crafting and building mechanism.

With fully using the falling-sand engine and even stretching it bounds, you can even see the world forming around you. Chasms leading to the depths of planet, collapsing caves, vapor gasses rising from ground. What a beautiful, but dangerous world to live in!

IN DEVELOPMENT - All features are not yet implemented.
